name: 2.27.0.Final
body:
## What's Changed
* Bump junit-jupiter from 5.8.2 to 5.9.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/forge/roaster/pull/248
* Bump mockito-core from 4.6.1 to 4.7.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/forge/roaster/pull/249
* Removed LGTM badges by @gastaldi in https://github.com/forge/roaster/pull/252
* Bump mockito-core from 4.7.0 to 4.8.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/forge/roaster/pull/253
* Bump org.eclipse.jdt.core from 3.30.0 to 3.31.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/forge/roaster/pull/255
* Bump junit-jupiter from 5.9.0 to 5.9.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/forge/roaster/pull/256
* Simplified `AbstractJavaSourceMemberHolder#addInterface(java.lang.String)` by @gastaldi in https://github.com/forge/roaster/pull/261
* Support nested types in Records by @gastaldi in https://github.com/forge/roaster/pull/263
* Bump mockito-core from 4.8.0 to 4.8.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/forge/roaster/pull/264
* Support interfaces in Records by @gastaldi in https://github.com/forge/roaster/pull/266


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/forge/roaster/compare/2.26.0.Final...2.27.0.Final

name: 2.26.0.Final
body:
## What's Changed
* Bump mockito-core from 4.5.1 to 4.6.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/forge/roaster/pull/240
* Bump assertj-core from 3.22.0 to 3.23.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/forge/roaster/pull/241
* Bump assertj-core from 3.23.0 to 3.23.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/forge/roaster/pull/242
* Bump mockito-core from 4.6.0 to 4.6.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/forge/roaster/pull/243
* Bump org.eclipse.jdt.core from 3.29.0 to 3.30.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/forge/roaster/pull/244
* Handle spaces in JavadocImpl.getFullSpace by @gastaldi in https://github.com/forge/roaster/pull/246


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/forge/roaster/compare/2.25.0.Final...2.26.0.Final

name: 2.25.0.Final
body:
## What's Changed
* Bump nexus-staging-maven-plugin from 1.6.8 to 1.6.12 by @dependabot in https://github.com/forge/roaster/pull/229
* Bump mockito-core from 4.4.0 to 4.5.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/forge/roaster/pull/234
* Bump nexus-staging-maven-plugin from 1.6.12 to 1.6.13 by @dependabot in https://github.com/forge/roaster/pull/236
* Bump mockito-core from 4.5.0 to 4.5.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/forge/roaster/pull/235
* Better support for creation of Java Records by @gastaldi in https://github.com/forge/roaster/pull/239

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/forge/roaster/commits/2.25.0.Final

Add this to your pom.xml:

```xml
<properties>
  <version.roaster>2.25.0.Final</version.roaster>
</properties>

<dependency>
  <groupId>org.jboss.forge.roaster</groupId>
  <artifactId>roaster-api</artifactId>
  <version>${version.roaster}</version>
</dependency>
<dependency>
  <groupId>org.jboss.forge.roaster</groupId>
  <artifactId>roaster-jdt</artifactId>
  <version>${version.roaster}</version>
  <scope>runtime</scope>
</dependency>
```
